Body: How to do if I want to play some (any) sounds on one device, and then want another device to hear the same thing at the same time?And what i also mean is to be able to connect "directly" (via BlueTooth or WiFi) by not using any in-between Server or any such components. Or, should i say point-to-point? P2P? (Lets say without Internet)
Title: Realtime Transfer (Stream) the Audio to "another mobile" device "directly" without any in-between components?

history.Text: How to do if I want to play some (any) sounds on one device, and then want another device to hear the same thing at the same time?
Realtime Transfer (Stream) the Audio to "another mobile" device?
